Title: ThreeDWorld
Description: ThreeDWorld is a 3D game engine based on Microsoft's new Xna support in Silverlight 5. Engine features include an extendable content pipeline, bitmap and font sprites, 3D sprites, DeleD importer and Quake2 MD2 importer.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
ThreeDWorld is a 3D game engine based on Microsoft's new Xna support in Silverlight 5. Engine features include an extendable content pipeline, bitmap and font sprites, 3D sprites, DeleD importer and Quake2 MD2 importer.

System Requirements
  • Silverlight 5 Development Tools
  • Xna Game Studio 4.0

View Online Demo at ...

(Requires Silverlight 5 Developer runtime)

View and Download tutorials at ...

(Requires Silverlight 5 Developer runtime)
